events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was identified as a refund request based on the customer's report of receiving the incorrect product.
The case was assigned to agent Maria to handle the refund request and communicate with the customer.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. Iâ€™m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I will help you with the refund process.
Could you please send us a photo of the item you received as well as your order number to proceed with your refund?
I have attached the pictures showing the incorrect product and my order ID is 987654321. Please expedite the refund.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund within 3-5 business days and send you confirmation once completed.
Thank you for the prompt response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help in resolving this quickly.
The refund has been successfully processed and should appear on your payment method shortly. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund was received and to see if you require any additional support from our side.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and please reach out if you have any other issues in the future.
